Wishnutama Tegaskan Urusan Bekraf Beda dari Pariwisata
05 Nov 2019, 19:15 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Menteri Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif Wishnutama. (CNN Indonesia/Feri Agus Setyawan)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Menteri Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif [Menparekraf] WishnutamaÂ menegaskan dirinya tak bakal cawe-cawe dalam program Bekraf. Ditemui di M Bloc Space, Jakarta, pada Selasa (5/11), ia mengatakan program-program Bekraf yang sudah berjalan semestinya tetap didukung.Bekraf, kata Wishnutama, akan mengurus sektor yang berbeda dari Pariwisata."Bekraf enggak akan selalu ngurusin Pariwisata. Kalau ada urusan sendiri, silakan jalan, misalnya soal HaKI (Hak Kekayaan Intelektual), industri animasi, [industri] film," katanya.Menurut Wishutama, dari program Bekraf yang sudah berjalan hanya perlu dipastikan hasilnya. Jika tak baik, maka tak perlu dilanjutkan."Bekraf kan sudah punya visi misi sebelumnya, tinggal dijalankan saja. Jadi tujuan utamanya bukan berubah jadi ngurusin Pariwisata. Bukan lagi ego sektoral," ujarnya.Ia menambahkan, "Apa yang sudah dilakukan [Bekraf] dan sudah berhasil, ditingkatkan saja. Ada datanya positif, lanjutkan saja. Kalau gagal ya jangan dilanjutkan."Di era Kabinet Kerja I, Presiden Jokowi melahirkan Bekraf [Badan Ekonomi Kreatif] sebagai lembaga pemerintah nonkementerian melalui Peraturan Presiden Nomor 6 Tahun 2015. Namun di era Kabinet Indonesia Maju, Bekraf dilebur kembali dalam Kementerian Pariwisata.Mantan Kepala Bekraf, Triawan Munaf mengatakan selain mengadakan acara ekonomi kreatif, Bekraf pun sudah membangun ekosistem industri musik dan perfilman Indonesia yang lebih baik, seperti menghapus Daftar Negatif Investasi (DNI) bagi kemajuan perfilman serta mengadakan program Portamento untuk metadata musik Indonesia. Wishnutama Affirm Different Difrafraf Affairs of Tourism
05 Nov 2019, 19:15 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy Wishnutama. (CNN Indonesia / Agus Setyawan Ferries)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy [Menparekraf] Wishnutama emphasized that he would never be a fig in the Bekraf program. Met at M Bloc Space, Jakarta, on Tuesday (11/5), he said that Bekraf's programs that were already running should be supported. Brafraf, Wishnutama said, would take care of a different sector of Tourism. "Bekraf will not always take care of Tourism. "If you have your own business, please go, for example about Intellectual Property Rights (IPR), the animation industry, [the film industry]," he said. If it is not good, then it does not need to be continued. "Bekraf already has a vision and mission before, just run it. So the main goal is not to turn into managing Tourism. No longer sectoral ego," he said. He added, "What has been done [Bekraf] and it has succeeded, just improved. There is positive data, just continue. If it fails then don't continue. "In the era of Working Cabinet I, President Jokowi gave birth to Bekraf [Creative Economy Agency] as a non-ministerial government institution through Presidential Regulation No. 6/2015. But in Indonesian Cabinet era Forward, Bekraf was merged back into the Ministry of Tourism. Former Head of Bekraf, Triawan Munaf said that aside from holding a creative economic event, Bekraf had also built a better ecosystem of the Indonesian music and film industry, such as removing the Negative Investment List (DNI) for film advancement and holding a Portamento program for Indonesian music metadata. (rea)
